data.Tagline: Sustainable Real Assets for a Changing Climate

data.Name: E8
data.About: Early-stage cleantech investor network founded in 2006. Over $37M invested in 98 deals to date. Funding includes equity, capital debt funds, project financing, and innovative revenue-sharing structures.

data.Name: Generate Capital
data.About:
After decades of collective experience financing billions of dollars of sustainable infrastructure, Generate Capital has created the Infrastructure-as-a-Service™ model.

Unlike traditional capital sources, Generate Capital has the people, systems, and flexibility that make us the leading capital partner for technology manufacturers, project developers, and system integrators driving the Resource Revolution.
data.Tagline: The Capital Partner for the Resource Revolution

data.Name: Homecoming Capital
data.About: Climate change focused firm investing in early stage ventures and in later stage infrastructure projects. Backed by long-term, private investment capital.
data.Tagline: Using capital to fight climate change

data.Name: New Haven Community Solar
data.About: New Haven Community Solar owns is a 9.24 kW community solar project located on Button Street in New Haven, Connecticut. The lot on Button Street is the site of this year's annual Jim Vlock First Year Building Project – a partnership between the Yale School of Architecture and Columbus House. Columbus House is a nonprofit organization based in New Haven that serves people who are homeless or at risk of becoming homeless by providing shelter and housing and by fostering their personal growth and independence. This project creates a predictable set of future cash flows for investors and provide Columbus House access to low-cost electricity to further their mission.
data.Tagline: Providing equitable and renewable energy to the citizens of Elm City.

data.Name: Prossano
data.About: Prossano is an impact investing platform that believes that returns don't have to be sacrificed to create impact. With this premise in mind, Prossano invests in companies that are sustainable (those with a profitable business model that can attract capital to scale and create a large impact) and that look to make an impact ( those producing a product or service that has a positive effect on the planet or society)

data.Name: Queensland Investment Corporation
data.About: Created in 1991 by the Queensland government to serve its long-term investment responsibilities, QIC has grown into a leading long-term specialist manager in alternatives. Focuses on infrastructure, real estate, and private capital. Also specialises in liquid market solutions, providing multi-asset portfolios, liquid alternatives, active fixed interest and tailored overlays for clients. Manages $60B. Suitable for funding a large pipeline of projects.
data.Tagline: QIC's vision, mission and standards of excellence guide their approach to all that they do.

data.Name: Raise Green
data.About: Raise Green is a financial technology platform for community-driven project finance. We empower all individuals with the tools they need to create and invest directly in to climate solution projects, like community solar. By creating new investment pathways open to anyone, we seek to democratize the ownership and benefits of the clean energy and climate-resilient infrastructure of the future. There is a gap in the ability of community based organizations like schools, churches, community centers, non-profits, and small businesses to get financing for solar and renewable energy projects. We offer a toolkit -- an Originator Packet -- for these types of organizations to develop and finance these types of projects. We then pair these projects with individuals or institutions that want to do small to medium scale impact investing in support of these organizations. Raise Green takes advantage of recent regulatory changes that open up the opportunity for non-accredited individuals to invest directly into private project finance companies that can accelerate the deployment of clean energy in a socially and financially inclusive way.
data.Tagline: Sustainable financial technology for community-scale green infrastructure projects

data.Name: Spring Lane Capital
data.About: Spring Lane Capital offers a new approach to faster growth for companies that deploy smaller-scale projects and equipment. With our Integrated Deployment Capital model, we partner with entrepreneurs in the energy, water, food and waste industries to help them offer their customers what they really want: Solutions, not complications.
data.Tagline: Providing catalytic project capital for sustainable solutions

data.Name: The Rise Fund
data.Tagline: The World Economic Forum is an international institution committed to improving the state of the world through public-private cooperation.

data.Name: Urban US
data.About: Focuses on startups solving city problems. Prioritizew founder' success in delivering, rapid, scalable, positive results. Three elements: 1) Urban-X is a pre-seed accelerator, in partnership with Mini; 2) Urban US Ventures is a seed stage VC; 3) Urban US Capital invests in emerging technology assets.
data.Tagline: Urban Us is the leading early stage investor for startups re-imagining cities, supporting founders from product launch to global growth.

data.Name: Vision Ridge Partners
data.About: More than $1B raised to invested in sustainable real assets. Invests across all real asset sectors, including energy, agriculture, transportation and real estate.
data.Tagline: Vision Ridge Partners, LLC, a clean energy oriented investment firm, is active in renewable energy, green building, future utility business models and advanced transportation.

data.Name: Wunder
data.About: Wunder provides construction and term financing for commercial solar projects. Financeable project structures range from traditional commercial solar PPAs to feed-in-tariffs, community solar developments, and unrated credit offtakers, to name a few. Wunder’s dedicated team will always work directly with you to get your unique project financed.
data.Tagline: Non-recourse financing for your commercial or community solar projects.
